verses.name: Jude 1:21
verses.text: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.

verses.name: Jude 1:22
verses.text: And of some have compassion, making a difference:

verses.name: Jude 1:23
verses.text: And others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.

verses.name: Jude 1:24
verses.text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

verses.name: Jude 1:25
verses.text: To the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
